CustomField.description: For Transaction and Payment Ledger Entries, the date that the payment is made or reversed. For Allocation Ledger Entries, the date that the gift was pledged.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For Transaction and Payment Ledger Entries, the date that the payment is made or reversed. For Allocation Ledger Entries, the date that the gift was pledged.
CustomField.label: Transaction Date
